ygData.subject: Re: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL! Why would you want a weapon that proc Gate?  I can see it now party is in a heated battle in the Plane of Hate/Fear/Air, the bard thrust with his/her
ygData.messageBody:
LOL! Why would you want a weapon that proc Gate? I can see it now party is
in a heated battle in the Plane of Hate/Fear/Air, the bard thrust with
his/her mighty Quill of Gating and POOF! the Bard goes back to her/his home
point, ROFL :p Sounds like a silly rumor to me.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

>From: "Ben Wilson" <ruldaas@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
>Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 11:47:43 PDT
>
>A fellow bard has heard rumor of a bard only "ultimate" weapon called the
>quill that procs gate. He says it is found in the Plane of Hate on the
>Maestro of Rancor. I'm skeptical by nature but he also sent me along a
>screenshot of this Maestro character in front of a huge organ. Anyone else
>hear about this? I've got the screenshot if anyone wants to see it.
>
>Ruldaas Riverdance bard of The Rathe
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
>with the subject lol.
><< text3.html >>
